casebody.data:
PETROLEUM CONVERSION CORPORATION, Petitioner-Appellant, v. James A. VAUGHAN, Individually and as Administrator of the Estate of Elizabeth Boyd Vaughan, Deceased, and Edward A. Rogers, Appellees. No. 254

— October Term, 1955.

Docket 23864. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued April 2, 3, 1956. Decided April 16, 1956. Morgan P. Ames, Warren Egenton, Stamford, Conn., Cummings & Lockwood, Stamford, Conn., of counsel, for petitioner-appellant. James A. Vaughan, New York City, for appellees.

Before FRANK, MEDINA and WATERMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion of Judge Anderson. 140 F.Supp. 369.
